biotools.summary: TOFistAC toolbox is a collection of scripts for automated ionization state assignment and calibration of time-of-flight mass spectrometry data over the broad m/z range (1-100 kDa). The scripts include automated correction of acquisition time delay, assignment of ionization sates in corrected TOF, and quadratic calibration from TOF to M/Z domain based on known +1 standards and their auto-detected ionization states.
